oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Children pose for a photograph outside school
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1910s; children; schools;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Children pose for a school photograph. Note on back reads "Top, Hartford Kaufman, Ed Stifs, Baultus Neilus, [unkown], - Walter Streuli, [unkown], William Remmer, - Middle, Lillian Hale, ELise Barker, Caroline Mogs, Miss Shaugh, - [unkown], Susan Sluth, Elenaor Walher, - Bottom, [unkown], Louise Dolram, ]unkown], [unkown], J. G. Lowenthal, - Alex Mayer, Warren Castle."
